recipes.description: "Really, really good and moist- my kids eat it as quickly as I can make it.  Bread will freeze well, and keep in refrigerator for weeks."

ingredients: 3/4 cup finely crushed saltine cracker crumbs
recipes.description: "This is an easy tasty meatloaf. It tastes as good as it smells!"
"This is the moistest banana bread that I have ever tasted. It's also very easy to make!"

"Someone gave me this recipe a few years back and it's become a household favorite. You can use mild, medium or hot salsa depending on your taste. I usually serve it with Spanish rice and Mexican-style canned corn. Very easy and quick!"

ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained
2 ounces canned diced jalapeno peppers, drained
recipes.description: "This will definitely be the biggest hit at the party!  This is such an easy appetizer to make and it tastes just like the jalapeno poppers you wish you could make yourself!  The hardest part of this recipe is not eating it all by yourself! Serve with sliced sourdough baguettes, tortilla chips or crackers."
"My family begs me to make this creamy baked dish every Thanksgiving and Christmas.  What makes it so good is the pecan topping!  Try it and I'm sure it will become your new tradition!"
"A very light and fluffy pancake that requires fresh buttermilk, but it's the best I've ever made!"
"Here is a simple but delicious crepe batter which can be made in minutes. It's made from ingredients that everyone has on hand."

ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, chopped
recipes.description: "Here's a delicious stuffed pepper recipe that's easy to make. Each green bell pepper contains ground beef, onion, tomatoes, rice and cheese, and is cooked in tomato soup."

ingredients: 2 cooked, boneless chicken breast halves, shredded
1 (4.5 ounce) package quick cooking long grain and wild rice with seasoning packet
recipes.recipe_name: Creamy Chicken and Wild Rice Soup
recipes.description: "A supremely filling, hearty soup.  I serve this on cold rainy days with a loaf of homemade bread.  Hint: this is perfect for leftover rotisserie chicken or chicken you've pulled from the bone after making homemade chicken stock!  This soup makes great leftovers, but you might want to thin it slightly with skim milk or water when reheating."

ingredients: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
recipes.recipe_name: Slow Cooker Italian Beef for Sandwiches
recipes.description: "This makes a sandwich similar to one I used to get at a local restaurant when I lived in a suburb of Chicago. My all time favorite! Serve on crusty rolls with roasted sweet or hot peppers, if desired."

recipes.recipe_name: Baked Asparagus with Balsamic Butter Sauce
recipes.description: "This is a simple and delicious side dish. Fresh asparagus is baked until tender, and dressed with a blend of butter, soy sauce, and balsamic vinegar."

ingredients: 1/2 cup spinach, rinsed and thinly sliced
recipes.description: "Hearty lentil soup, chock full of veggies and very yummy. Serve with warm cornbread."
"A delicious Italian breaded chicken smothered with cheese and tomato-based pasta sauce!"
"Crowd pleasing banana pancakes made from scratch. A fun twist on ordinary pancakes."

"This is an all time, excellent, every time recipe. It is very simple, and so well loved by many. I make these for family, friends, school functions, work functions, for gifts etc. It has always been raved about - even by kids! I recommend bringing this to your Thanksgiving function; you will be thanked many times for this delicious taste treat. This is a large quantity, but you will end up making this size batch more than once. You can also make muffins and small loaves using this recipe; bake for 30 to 35 minutes."

ingredients: 6 slices white bread, toasted and cut into cubes
recipes.description: "My mom has always made this for us on Christmas morning, and since we only have it once a year it makes it even more good. It is so delicious, and everyone enjoys it! When I double the recipe I use 1 pound regular sausage and 1 pound sage sausage."
"This is my version of sausage gravy...the best! Pour over hot biscuits (I use store bought.) Follow these directions and you won't be disappointed! Very fattening and Umm Umm Good!"
"Chocolate cookies coated in confectioners' sugar...very good!"
"These biscuits are cheesy and rich, and fairly close to the ones a famous seafood restaurant chain serves."

ingredients: 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into cubes
recipes.description: "This is a family favorite.  A creamy, cheesy Alfredo dish, great with a salad and garlic bread."

ingredients: 1 (18.25 ounce) package moist white cake mix
recipes.description: "Fancy taste without all the work.  This cake is wonderful for a get together or just a special occasion at home.  Using a box cake mix as a base it's a real time saver!"
"An old stand-by that the whole family loves."

ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
recipes.description: "A delicious citrus chicken recipe with flavors reminiscent of the orange chicken from a popular restaurant in the mall."

ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chiles
2 teaspoons chili powder, or to taste
recipes.description: "Rice is sauteed with onion and green bell pepper, and then simmered with water, chopped tomatoes and spices."

"It's a quick, easy meal that is very filling. Some people will also top it with regular taco toppings, i.e. lettuce, tomatoes, black olives, etc. It also is great as leftovers for lunches! Serve with taco sauce."
"Chicken, rice, soy sauce and shredded egg stir fried together. This is a very simple recipe. It is easy, but tasty! Note: Never use rice that you have just cooked."

ingredients: 1 pinch salt and black pepper to taste
recipes.description: "A super rich, classic 'bacon and egg' spaghetti dish. Great to serve for company. This recipe also makes an unusual brunch offering."
"This really is the best banana bread I have ever tasted.  Very moist and it freezes well. I also bake this in 3 small loaf pans however you may need to shorten the baking time."

"These tasty meatballs will disappear quickly from anyone's holiday party. My mom makes them every year for New Years Eve, and now so do I. These do very well in a slow cooker, as you can simmer them before serving, as well as keep them hot for the duration of your party."

ingredients: 1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
recipes.description: "Quick and easy, but very delicious. One of my family's favorites served over brown rice."
"Baked chicken in a slow cooker for busy people! Put the chicken on in the morning, and have golden brown baked chicken for dinner."

ingredients: 1 medium butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cubed
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
recipes.description: "This is a thick, rich soup with tons of flavor. Something I whipped up off the top of my head, with things I had on hand. Super easy, quick, and a great way to use squash. An instant hit at my house."
"These slightly sweet potatoes are perfect with most entrees."
"This is a nice rich mac and cheese.  Serve with a salad for a great meatless dinner. Hope you enjoy it."

"This is my secret recipe for Garlic Mashed potatoes, reverse engineered from a certain Italian restaurant.  This recipe for 100 servings, I usually cut it down to 10 servings (1 5lb bag of potatoes).  I guarantee that these are the best potatoes you've ever tasted."

"My girlfriend brought these granola bars over for a playgroup one morning and ever since they've been a staple!  My son requests them almost daily so I usually triple the recipe and make 2 trays so we have plenty on hand."
"These crispy shrimp are rolled in a coconut beer batter before frying. For dipping sauce, I use orange marmalade, mustard and horseradish mixed to taste."

ingredients: 1 (7 ounce) can white tuna, drained and flaked
recipes.description: "This is a really great tuna salad recipe I got from a friend who used it in her catering service business many years ago. The secret ingredients are the curry and Parmesan cheese! Odd combinations but this makes a terrific tuna sandwich! She used it for an appetizer with gourmet crackers and people always wanted her recipe. I have never tasted another tuna salad quite like this one, and it has been my favorite recipe for tuna salad for many, many years."
"This is a nice soft center sugar cookie."
"Tender squash, gooey cheese and crunchy crackers make this a memorable side dish or a hearty main course. This is a great dish that can be made with low-fat ingredients and is still just as good!"

"I've been using this chocolate frosting recipe forever, and several friends now use it as their 'favorite frosting!' It's smooth, creamy and not-too-dark. I just wanted to share it with chocolate lovers everywhere! It will frost, but not fill, an 8 or 9 inch layer cake."

"This is the 'secret' Greek dressing recipe from the pizzeria that I work at.  The recipe makes almost a gallon but can be scaled down easily. It can be used for picnics and travels very well, since it doesn't need to be refrigerated.  This is the best dressing I have ever tasted, people offer to buy it constantly, but if we sold it we wouldn't be able to make enough to use in the restaurant!"
"This is a very easy homemade red sauce, and the only one my 5 year old daughter will eat! Serve with your favorite pasta."

ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed
recipes.description: "This soup is one of those last minute things I tossed together one night. It's very simple and it takes about 5 minutes to put together."

ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with garlic and onion
recipes.description: "An old boyfriend's mother used to cook this for me whenever I ate over. Cheese tortellini are served in a creamy tomato and spinach sauce. I love it!"
"This very easy dish works with any cut of chicken, skin on or off...even with whole split chickens. My family loves this and it takes no time at all. Don't omit the parsley."

ingredients: 1 head leaf lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
fresh ground black pepper to taste
recipes.description: "This is the best salad I've ever eaten and I make it all the time. It is tangy from the blue cheese, fruity from the pears, and crunchy from the caramelized pecans. The mustard vinaigrette pulls it all together."

ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can canned kidney beans - drained, rinsed, and mashed
recipes.description: "This is a very simple and hearty chili with plenty of flavor. It's even better the second day! I serve this with lowfat Cheddar cheese and lowfat sour cream. It's also delicious with crackers."

ingredients: 1 dash hot pepper sauce, or to taste
recipes.description: "This recipe is a favorite with my husband. I usually serve it with buttered egg noodles and sugar snap peas."
"Slow cooked, Texas-style pulled pork that is served on a buttered and toasted roll.  My family's favorite."
"This is a simple recipe that everyone loves. For a quick Mediterranean macaroni and cheese, omit the basil. Easily doubled, too!"
"Refrigerated biscuits with cinnamon bake in a tube pan. My 7 year old daughter, Leah, loves her Monkey Bread. Enjoy!"
"An easy and delicious way to prepare tender barbecued ribs without the barbecue!"

"This Recipe is a State Fair Blue Ribbon winner.  This is an easy sugar cookie recipe, you don't have to roll it out, and the cookies are soft and chewy, unlike other sugar cookies. Anybody can make these."

ingredients: 1 (2 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
recipes.description: "This is an easy and very tasty dish. I often substitute ground turkey and low fat dairy products and it is still delicious! Serve with chips, salsa and green salad."

"These are tender and the meat falls right off the bone. Generally, people think of baby back ribs as a meal they would only order when at a restaurant, but they are so easy to make at home. This recipe could not be any more simple."

ingredients: 4 large baked potatoes, peeled and cubed
recipes.description: "Thick and creamy. Uses leftover baked potatoes."
"I make this to take to pot luck dinners and get rave reviews!  Easy to make, smells great while cooking and tastes wonderful!"

ingredients: 1 (3 pound) beef eye of round roast
recipes.description: "Eye of round roast is roasted at 500 degrees F. This recipe takes a very tough piece of meat and makes it so tender and delicious.  Feel free to improvise with the seasonings and use garlic salt in place of regular salt. The easiest roast you'll ever cook!"

"A delicious, traditional, cream based chowder, this recipe calls for the standard chowder ingredients: onion, celery, potatoes, diced carrots, clams, and cream.  A little red wine vinegar is added before serving for extra flavor."

recipes.recipe_name: Marie's Easy Slow Cooker Pot Roast
recipes.description: "Moist and juicy pot roast done in a slow cooker with carrots, onion and potatoes."
"Best brownies I've ever had!"

ingredients: 1 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste
recipes.description: "Yummy shrimp in an Alfredo sauce, with portobello mushrooms and red peppers."
"The perfect fluffy frosting for brownies or chocolate cake.  Sweet but not too sweet.  Peanut buttery but not greasy.  So wonderful and it won't over power your brownies!!!"
"Delicious cinnamon rolls made with a soft, quick rising dough."

ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix
2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (1 ounce) packet dry au jus mix
recipes.description: "This recipe goes together quickly and does not need a lot of time in the slow cooker.  It's a delicious way to add flavor to ground beef and the children love it! The gravy is delightful served over mashed potatoes."

ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
recipes.description: "These burritos are soooo good, you'll want to have them every night."

ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, drained
recipes.description: "Delicious and EASY zesty soup recipe that uses only 6 canned ingredients! Serve over tortilla chips, and top with shredded Cheddar cheese. Throw away the cans and no one will know that it is not from scratch!"
"A zesty, yet simple meal with an olive oil and balsamic vinegar marinade. A crowd pleaser!"

"My father's side of the family is Sicilian, and has been making these pork chops for at least 3 generations. My husband frequently requests these over my marinated and grilled pork chops when I give him a choice. If you do not have an oven-proof skillet, you may cook the chops on the stove at medium-low."
"Cajun cooking is a combination of French and Southern cuisine. It is robust, country style cookery - and so is this dish! Laissez le bon temp roulez and bon appetit!"
"These cheesy zucchini patties are an excellent way to use up that abundance of zucchini from the garden. Serve with a bit of tomato sauce or sour cream dabbed on top."

ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can chili beans, with liquid
1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans with liquid
1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, with liquid
2 (14.5 ounce) cans peeled and diced tomatoes
1 (4 ounce) can diced green chile peppers
recipes.description: "This is a quick, throw together slow cooker soup with a Mexican flair. Teenagers love it. Serve topped with corn chips, shredded Cheddar cheese and a dollop of sour cream. Make sure you adjust the amount of chile peppers if you're sensitive about spicy foods."
"These sweet pecans are wonderful snacks for any occasion."

ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen whipped topping, thawed
recipes.description: "Creamy and delicious--melts in your mouth. This pie is a real crowd-pleaser and it can be made with reduced-fat ingredients."

ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
recipes.description: "Creamy chicken and noodle casserole topped with crushed crackers. Wonderful as leftovers topped with melted cheese!"

"I always found turkey meatloaf to be quite disappointing. The flavor is usually lacking as well as the texture. Well, I have developed this version that has a great texture and a surprisingly good flavor (my brother couldn't even tell that it wasn't beef)! The secret is the quinoa, which adds wonderful texture and is much nuttier than breadcrumbs. I hope you enjoy this recipe!"

ingredients: 16 Boston Bibb or butter lettuce leaves
1 dash Asian chile pepper sauce, or to taste (optional)
1 (8 ounce) can water chestnuts, drained and finely chopped
recipes.description: "Delicious and bursting with flavor, Asian lettuce wraps are a great idea for entertaining or a family style meal. Each person can build their own fresh, delicious wrap. Just be sure to have plates or napkins available since the mixture can sometimes drip a little. To serve, allow each person to spoon a portion of the meat into a lettuce leaf. Wrap the lettuce around the meat like a burrito and enjoy!"
"Quick and easy marinade and so tasty, I was trusted with this recipe but I can't keep it to myself!"

"This is my mom's dense, excellent, and definitely unhealthy banana nut bread recipe.  It's always completely gone in minutes.  This is great at parties, but hazardous at home.  HEALTH WARNINGS: EBNB may be habit forming. A very flexible recipe that will accommodate changes based on what you have on hand.  Use any type of fat in place of the butter, such as shortening or oil. It works with either brown or white sugar too."

ingredients: 1 spaghetti squash, halved lengthwise and seeded
recipes.description: "The flesh of spaghetti squash comes out in long strands, very much resembling the noodles for which it is named. In this recipe, the 'noodles' are tossed with vegetables and feta cheese. You can substitute different vegetables, but be sure to use ones that have contrasting colors."

ingredients: 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
recipes.description: "At church functions, folks line up for this trifle. And it is so easy to make!"

ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds fresh broccoli, cut into bite size pieces
recipes.recipe_name: Broccoli with Garlic Butter and Cashews
recipes.description: "A new recipe a neighbor gave us. What a hit with my family. Just the right mixture of garlic and cashews with our favorite side dish, broccoli. And, so very easy to make!! If in a pinch, you could probably use frozen broccoli too, but I haven't tried."
"Easy peanut butter cocoa flavored cookies without turning on the oven."

ingredients: 2 red bell peppers, seeded and diced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
recipes.description: "A casserole dish of seasonal vegetables that is so easy to prepare. It can be made a day ahead - just reheat before serving. Lemon juice can be substituted for balsamic vinegar, and you can use baking potatoes if you don't have any Yukon Golds on hand."

ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
recipes.description: "A colorful, spicy, and refreshing bean and corn salad."

ingredients: 2 pounds clean, scrubbed new red potatoes
recipes.description: "This creamy salad is made with red potatoes, which give this dish--chock full of melt-in-your-mouth bacon, bits of hard boiled egg, crunchy celery and spicy onion--a delectable, firm texture."

"Hummus is a pureed garbanzo bean dip with Middle Eastern origins. Serve with pita and an assortment of fresh vegetables. This is the secret combination straight from a Boston restaurant. Tahini, or sesame seed paste, can be found in health food stores, gourmet shops and even many grocery stores."

ingredients: 3 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)
recipes.description: "Simply a great-tasting and easy-to-make whole wheat bread."

ingredients: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes
recipes.description: "An easy to make soup that's quite good. Fresh chicken and tortilla chips with vegetables. Makes for a delicious, warm soup. Try garnishing with cheese and/or a little sour cream."

"A Greek favorite that makes everyone think you are a master chef and is sooo easy to make!! I taught a Greek friend how to make apple pie and she taught me this fabulous recipe. The phyllo dough for this recipe is found in the freezer section of most grocery stores.  Add a little lemon zest to the sugar sauce, if desired."
"A simple, down to basics recipe when it comes to the good old tom turkey."

ingredients: 4 cups chicken stock, or enough to cover potatoes
recipes.description: "I have made this for many whom have given it the title. This takes a bit of effort but is well worth it. Please note: for those who do not wish to use bacon, substitute 1/4 cup melted butter for the bacon grease and continue with the recipe.  (I generally serve this soup as a special treat as it is not recommended for people counting calories.)"
"This recipe takes all the good things we love on pizza and combines them with egg noodles to form a great, one-dish casserole to feed your family."
"This is a delicious and healthy recipe that takes no time at all to make. You can bake it or even grill it. Tastes great either way!"

ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese for topping
recipes.description: "A chicken and spinach lasagna with a creamy white cheese sauce. Great for any kind of pot luck. My kids love it."

ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, with liquid
recipes.description: "One of my husband's favorites. I've been making this for over fifteen years, and he's not sick of it yet! Serve with pan sauces, crusty French bread and a tossed green salad."
"Great caramel popcorn for any holiday or occasion.  If you like chewy popcorn, bake less."
"This is a very fun recipe to follow, because Grandma makes it sweet and simple. This pie is thickened with cornstarch and flour in addition to egg yolks, and contains no milk."
"This unusual combination of common ingredients is fabulous! Everyone who tastes it asks me to share the recipe. You will love it and the many compliments you get--I promise!"
"This recipe makes the best naan I have tasted outside of an Indian restaurant. I can't make enough of it for my family. I serve it with shish kabobs, but I think they would eat it plain."

ingredients: 1 green bell pepper, seeded and chopped
recipes.description: "This is a salad that everyone seems to love. I always get lots of compliments on this recipe and it is just a pleasing taste that seems to suit everyone."

ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup
recipes.description: "This is a tuna casserole that even my picky family loves! The potato chips give the casserole a crunchy crust."

ingredients: 1 1/4 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)
recipes.description: "After spending so much money on those Mall bought pretzels, I thought I'd try making some myself. So here's a recipe that has worked for me. These pretzels are a bit sweeter than other types and are buttery. These are great plain with a bit of pretzel salt or coated with cinnamon and sugar. Once finished, dip the hot pretzel in melted butter and coat with your favorite flavors. Enjoy!"
"This cake was first made for me by a friend while I was visiting her after she had delivered her 11th child. I told her, 'I should have baked for you!'"
"A rich moist chocolate cake with a chocolate buttercream icing. This is the best cake in the world!"

ingredients: 1 pound sweet Italian sausage, casings removed
4 large tomatoes - peeled, seeded and chopped
recipes.description: "This soup embodies all the wonders of Italian cooking: Italian sausage, garlic, tomatoes and red wines. Serve with hot bread and salad for a delicious meal. Garnish with Parmesan cheese."
"A Thanksgiving classic. Originally submitted to ThanksgivingRecipe.com."

"This is a simple and delicious recipe. After making them the first time my husband said 'no more' to beef burgers. These are really good - any cooking method may be used, and they freeze very well. The recipe can also be used for meatballs or meat loaves."

ingredients: 2 cups canned red beans, drained and rinsed
recipes.description: "Easy to make, great anytime, and always a favorite."
"Make a holiday breakfast -- or afternoon tea -- really special with these sweet bakery treats."

ingredients: 1 (3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces
recipes.description: "Baked chicken with a sweet and spicy glaze."
"These are a low calorie nutritious snack. Like potato chips, you cannot stop at just eating one. They are great for parties and a good conversation topic."

ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers
recipes.description: "Delicious white bean chili. Cha Cha says: 'It's kinda spicy, so watch out!' Substitute mild green chiles for the jalapenos if you're scared! Use more chicken and cheese as desired."
"This is the best recipe for creamy and delicious peanut butter fudge I have ever used.  It is great for sharing at work."

ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch cubes
1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes with juice
1 pound frozen cooked shrimp without tails
recipes.description: "This recipe came about from a lot of experimenting over the years. My family and friends like this version the best. Serve over cooked rice."

ingredients: 2 tart apples - peeled, cored and sliced
recipes.description: "Warm, spicy, and sweet, this wonderful Fall recipe is a guaranteed favorite for kids, and is great with smashed potatoes and buttered green beans."
"This is a very refreshing drink!"

ingredients: 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese for topping
recipes.description: "I created this soup after becoming tired of the excess salt and lack of veggies in canned minestrone.  I recalled a great bowl of minestrone that was overflowing with rich vegetables at the 'Sheepherder's Inn' in Sacramento, California.  Great with a hearty bread, romaine salad and a nice Merlot!"
"This was my aunt's recipe for fudge, passed down through the family. It's better than any fudge I've ever had at the Jersey shore, and easy enough to whip up in 15 minutes or so."

ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) bar chocolate flavored confectioners coating
recipes.description: "This recipe is very versatile and heavily addictive. You can mix and match cake and icing flavors as well as the chocolate coatings. The variations are unlimited, and they can be nicely packaged and given as gifts."

ingredients: 1/2 fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped
recipes.description: "Refried beans are simple to make when cooked in a slow cooker.  This recipe will yield flavorful, fat-free refried beans seasoned with garlic, jalapeno, and cumin."
"A great combination of chocolate chips, oatmeal, and peanut butter."

ingredients: 2 (14.5 ounce) cans peeled and diced tomatoes
1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
recipes.description: "This is a great recipe that you can fix to your taste!  The longer it simmers the better.  Top with crushed tortilla chips and shredded cheese.  Enjoy!"

ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 (6 ounce) package herb and garlic feta, crumbled
1 (9 inch) unbaked deep dish pie crust
recipes.description: "Let me start by saying that I devised this recipe myself, and I just sort of add 'this and that.' This recipe is VERY forgiving, so you can add or remove ingredients according to your taste!"
"Tart, rich and perfection, all rolled into one! Wow your friends with this simple recipe.  Hint: No Substitutions!"
"Shortbread thumbprint cookie filled with raspberry jam, and drizzled with glaze."
"This entree is easy and delicious!  It's one of my husband's favorites! Try to use the largest chicken breasts you can find so you'll be able to roll them easier."
"A fun chicken recipe the kids can help prepare. They love crushing the crackers. It does not matter if the measurements aren't perfect, just wing it!"
"This recipe comes from my mother-in-law in Canada. It's the most moist corn bread that I have ever tasted. It's great with chili con carne or as stuffing for your holiday turkey."

"Once you taste this, you won't ever go back to the marshmallow-topped variety! I have peeled and cooked in the microwave, and also boiled the sweet potatoes. They taste the same no matter how you cook them. So, use the technique that works best for you!"

ingredients: 1 (17.5 fluid ounce) bottle buffalo wing sauce, divided
1/2 (1 ounce) package dry ranch salad dressing mix
recipes.description: "This is a spicy, hearty sandwich that will please those who love buffalo chicken wings. This recipe is perfect for those days spent watching football. I like to top these with blue cheese or ranch dressing."

ingredients: 1 (32 ounce) package frozen hash brown potatoes
2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of potato soup
recipes.recipe_name: Cheesy Ham and Hash Brown Casserole
recipes.description: "I mostly use this as a breakfast casserole, but it's great anytime. May be served with or without diced ham. Quick and easy to make, not to mention delicious!"
"Quick and easy to make. A family favorite. The ketchup and brown sugar give these loaves a tangy flavor."

ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
recipes.description: "A delicious pasta and chicken dish with garlic, sun-dried tomatoes and fresh basil. Use the dry packaged sun-dried tomatoes instead of the tomatoes packed in olive oil. The sauce can be kept, covered, for one day in the refrigerator; heat again over low heat. Try it with some crusty bread if desired."
"The combination of picante sauce and chicken broth makes this easy recipe very tasty!"

ingredients: 1 pound cod fillets, cut into 2 to 3 ounce portions
recipes.description: "I'm from San Diego and these taste just like home! We live in the south now, and nobody has heard of these! Serve with homemade pico de gallo, and lime wedges to squeeze on top!"

ingredients: 2 pounds medium raw shrimp, shelled, deveined, with tails attached
recipes.description: "Easy version of this classic with the wonderful 'zip' of Dijon-style mustard."
"Mini muffins that taste just like cinnamon sugar doughnut holes!  The secret ingredient is nutmeg."
"I have been making this recipe for over 20 years. This can be served over either rice or noodles. A little work but worth the effort."

ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
recipes.description: "I serve this in the summer for brunch with a side of sausage links and a fresh fruit bowl!"
"A basic scone recipe that really does the trick. Tried and tested through 3 generations of kids. Simply the best anywhere!"
"Roast chicken pieces with sticky, sweet and tangy coating."
"'If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed', ye shall make and enjoy this simple, tangy, delicious grilled chicken dish!"
"A lovely, crispy waffle perfect for the morning."

ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - cubed
recipes.description: "I was given this recipe by my mom when I went away to college, and it has become all of my friends' favorite!"
"Unlike most pecan pies, this one does not require corn syrup."

ingredients: 6 fluid ounces warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)
recipes.description: "This sauce is wonderfully flavorful and is worth adding in the numerous ingredients."
"Blueberries and zucchini baked up into delicious little summertime bread loaves!"

ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
recipes.description: "Chicken Florentine casserole, which can also be adapted with either fish or shrimp, lies on a bed of spinach leaves and mushrooms, has a creamy white sauce mixed with garlic, Parmesan cheese, and Italian seasonings, and is topped with baked mozzarella."
"This recipe was shared with me by a special friend in Atlanta, Ga.  It has long been a favorite, and everyone who tastes it says it is the best they have ever had."

ingredients: 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - cut into chunks
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained

"This recipe will produce the biggest biscuits in the history of the world! Serve these gems with butter, preserves, honey, gravy or they can also be used as dinner rolls...you get the picture. The dough can also be prepared several hours, and up to a day ahead of time. If so, turn dough out onto aluminum foil that has been either floured, lightly buttered or lightly sprayed with cooking spray. Roll up foil until it is sealed, and refrigerate.  Don't be surprised if your biscuits rise even higher because the baking powder has had more time to act in the dough. You may have to make a few batches before you get desired results: desired results equals huge mongo biscuits."

The term can now apply to any superior cook (yes, men too), and also to this dish (chicken, ham and Swiss cheese slices, breaded and sauteed). This yummy version adds paprika and a creamy white wine sauce worthy of its own blue ribbon. Two blue ribbon tastes in wedded bliss -- Chicken Cordon Bleu II!"

If you would like the soup to be spicier, you can add some red chili flakes or salsa. Definitely use fresh bread crumbs and freshly grate your cheese instead of using the canned variety...it really does make a difference."

ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed
recipes.description: "This recipe is excellent served for breakfast with fruit or at lunch or dinnertime with a salad. This recipe makes two 9 inch pies. The reason for this is because if you only make one you will hate yourself the next day when there are no leftovers. The quiche microwaves well the next day. In fact most people say that the flavors have blended better on the second day... If in the strange case that you are filled up with one pie, this is a great gift to give a friend or relative, or if you are stingy...it freezes well with tin foil."

ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
recipes.description: "A delicious combination of chicken with Swiss cheese, seasoning and creamy goodness in one easy baked dish! Who could ask for more?!"

ingredients: 5 1/2 pounds apples - peeled, cored and finely chopped
recipes.description: "This tasty apple butter is a real slow cooker, but well worth the wait. Depending on the sweetness of the apples used, the amount of sugar may be adjusted to taste."
"Sweet and spicy rub for pork tenderloins. Just coat, let stand for 20 minutes and grill! Goes great with polenta or mashed yams."
"This recipe is over 100 years old. My sister-in-law's grandmother said it was a no-fail recipe. It's the best I ever had."

ingredients: 1 (2 pound) package frozen hash brown potatoes, thawed
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
recipes.description: "Cheesy and delicious, this hash brown casserole has a crunchy topping."

"This cake is made with three layers: Cake, filling, and topping.  There are 4 types of milk in the filling and topping (whole milk, condensed milk, evaporated milk, and heavy cream).  This is an excellent cake for milk lovers!"

"This recipe for lamb chops is a favorite in my house.  It is an easy and quick recipe for two people (we eat two chops each). Rosemary and thyme give it great flavor.  If you double the recipe, remember that the sauce will take longer to reduce."

ingredients: 1/2 cucumber - peeled, seeded, and finely chopped
recipes.description: "This is a great recipe for falafel. Everyone that I have made it for loves it. Yum!"
"Lemony flavored chicken with a heavenly coating. Prepare this dish and get ready to have your tummy 'touched by an angel'!"
"Wonderfully flavorful and fragrant bread for the holidays."
"My family has been using this very simple and delicious recipe for sausage, peppers, and onions for years and years now. For an extra kick, try using half sweet sausage and half hot sausage!"

"This is the 1999 American Pie Council 's National Pie Championship's first place winner in the Quick and Easy Category. Garnish each piece with a slice of lime and a dollop of whipped cream or whipped topping if you like."

recipes.recipe_name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough + Cupcake = The BEST Cupcake.  Ever.
recipes.description: "Seriously, I'm a cupcake aficionado and these cupcakes are amazing!  I saw them on a bakery menu and decided to replicate them."

ingredients: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into cubes
1 bunch slender asparagus spears, trimmed, cut on diagonal into 1-inch pieces
recipes.description: "A light but super-tasty pasta dish, with fresh asparagus cooked in broth with sauteed garlic and seasoned chicken."

recipes.recipe_name: Absolutely the Best Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: "This is a secret family recipe for chocolate chip cookies!  Everyone who tries them begs for more.  Enjoy!!"

"This recipe comes from an Amish family who package this treat for gifts to friends and neighbors every Christmas. It is truly the tastiest, easiest, and most foolproof caramel corn recipe you'll ever find!"

"This is a recipe that I created by modifying my mother's recipe. My boyfriend is a fettuccine Alfredo connoisseur and he scrapes the pan every time! I get nothing but rave reviews when I make this dish. I must warn you, this recipe is not for the health conscious. Enjoy!"
"Apples, nuts and cinnamon make these bars delicious. They hardly last a day at my house!"
"This dish is zesty and yummy! It is very easy to make, as well as very deserving of 3 exclamation points!!! Spoon meat onto toasted sandwich buns, and top with additional barbecue sauce."
"This is my mother's wonderful lasagna recipe.  It has been a favorite in our family for years!"

ingredients: 3/4 pound Colby cheese, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
recipes.description: "This incredible meatloaf is sure to be a family favorite. It's SIMPLE to make using turkey, loads of cheese, and Italian bread crumbs."

ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can black olives, drained and chopped

salt and ground black pepper to taste
recipes.description: "A delicious pasta, meat and cheese combination with a homemade dressing. It serves a crowd and is great for a picnic."
"This is a super easy recipe to throw together and, with the addition of different vegetables, can make lots of variations."
"A moist and flavorful recipe that makes a large quantity of cake. I have been hounded to make this cake time and time again."

ingredients: 2 pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined with tails attached
recipes.description: "This makes the best shrimp! Remove from skewers and serve on a bed of pasta with sauce for a great meal."

"This ham tastes very much like the famous honey baked ham but costs much less, and there's no need to fight the crowds at holiday time. You can even buy the ham presliced to make it easier and more like the original. It is very good.  (I do this while preparing the rest of the meal in the kitchen so that I don't forget to baste!)"

ingredients: 1 1/2 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)

recipes.description: "Big chewy pretzels like those sold in the mall! You may substitute garlic salt or cinnamon sugar for the coarse salt if you wish."

ingredients: 1 medium head garlic - peeled and sliced

"Ground beef, fresh onion, green bell pepper, tomatoes and rice are simmered in a sweet-hot sauce of chile, brown sugar, cumin and Worcestershire. This savory rice dish is then baked with Cheddar and garnished with fresh cilantro."

ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into chunks

They reduce to a nice, thick sauce. Substitute cashews for peanuts, or bamboo shoots for the water chestnuts. You can't go wrong! Enjoy!"
"This recipe makes an ideal buttercream for frosting cakes and decorating them with borders."

ingredients: 4 cups apples - peeled, cored and diced

ingredients: 1 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped

ingredients: 1 1/2 cups candy-coated milk chocolate pieces (such as M&M's)
recipes.description: "Cookies using M&Ms candies, any variety. Old recipe-but ALWAYS a favorite!"

ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - cut into bite-size pieces

recipes.description: "This pasta dish incorporates some of the flavors of Greece. It makes a wonderfully complete and satisfying meal. For extra flavor, toss in a few kalamata olives. Use whatever pasta you have or prefer."

"This is a wonderful-tasting egg salad sandwich that you will definitely devour. It's really good on rye."

"Moist and delicious muffins! You may use up to one cup of chocolate chips if you like!"

ingredients: 1 (18.25 ounce) package devil's food cake mix

1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package spinach, rinsed and chopped

"Simple, savory, and very flavorful variation on new red potatoes. Excellent side dish!"

ingredients: 1 (1.8 ounce) package dry leek soup mix

recipes.description: "This is my dad's recipe. The entire family loves it! A flavorful spinach mixture fills a tasty bread bowl. Your family will love it, too."

ingredients: 1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)

ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of celery soup
recipes.description: "My mom used to make this recipe for us growing up. Now I make it for my family and they all love it! It's simple yet delicious! Enjoy!"

ingredients: 1 (19 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed

ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix
recipes.description: "These roasted red potatoes are very easy to prepare and taste excellent!"

ingredients: 3 slices bread, broken up into small pieces
recipes.description: "This is a succulent meatloaf glazed with a sweet and sour sauce that everyone will enjoy!"

ingredients: 4 tablespoons hot water or as needed
recipes.description: "I have tried so many versions of glazed doughnuts, and this one finally came out perfect! Just like the ones at my favorite doughnut shop."

ingredients: 2 teaspoons garlic powder, or to taste

recipes.description: "This actually uses my breading for Chicken Fried Steak---my husband suggested we try it with chicken breasts, and it was delicious!"
"This recipe helps you plan ahead by allowing you to make your mashed potatoes in advance!"

ingredients: 1 pound beef round steak, cut into thin strips
recipes.description: "Stir-fried beef in a light gingery sauce. Serve over steamed rice or hot egg noodles."

ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
recipes.description: "One of our family's favorites, it's also great when made with crab meat instead of the shrimp."

ingredients: 1/2 cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot)

They only take 10 minutes for prep, but need to be refrigerated for about an hour so the flour coating is firm. You can add more cayenne or use a higher hot sauce to butter ratio if you like them spicier! Enjoy."
"A good old fashioned soda bread with just the basic ingredients. Buttermilk gives this crusty loaf a good flavor. The best Irish soda bread around!"

ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup
recipes.description: "This is our family's very favorite comfort food."

ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained

recipes.recipe_name: Alaska Salmon Bake with Pecan Crunch Coating

ingredients: 2 (2 pound) slabs baby back pork ribs

recipes.description: "Man, when your guests bite into these at the Memorial Day cookout, they'll savor meat so tender and juicy that it slides right off the bone and gets you the respect you deserve! I have found that the major restaurant chains who make this awesome dish pre-cook their ribs SLOWLY before the quick grilling process."

Make a day or so before you wish to serve to meld the ingredients. I have used sugar substitutes for the white sugar and also used nonfat or low-fat mayonnaise and it still tastes great!"

ingredients: 1/2 (3.4 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix

"This is a very nice dinner for two. Serve it with your favorite pasta and tossed greens."

ingredients: 3 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut in half

"The basic cake mix cookie with a twist."

"Fabulous apple muffins with a delicious cinnamon crumb topping! Give them a try -- you won't be sorry!"

"This is an easy way to make a great side dish for burgers!"

recipes.description: "Not your everyday chicken dish! Stuffed with Cheddar and cream cheeses, then drenched with a garlic-lemon-butter sauce, your friends and family will be begging you to make this recipe - believe me, I know!"

recipes.description: "This is an elegant and quick romantic dinner for two. Wonderful served with steamed asparagus and baby red potatoes."

"These cookies are nutritious, as well as delicious."

ingredients: 1/2 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers, drained
recipes.description: "This has got to be the tastiest and the most moist cornbread I have ever made. It is the most requested thing I cook, so I am sharing it. Don't let the ingredients fool you.  It's unbelievable."

ingredients: 2 cups boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and cubed
recipes.description: "A tasty chicken and pasta dish."

ingredients: 2 teaspoons white sugar, or to taste
recipes.description: "A quick and easy recipe for real homemade tomato soup like no other you've had before."

ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into strips

recipes.description: "As with most slow cooker recipes this is tender and delicious."

"This moist rolled cake has a rich cream cheese filling. Serve it cold. This will be a hit! It has a pinwheel look."

ingredients: 1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix

"These are very moist, and so far I haven't found anyone who doesn't love them!"

ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
recipes.description: "Made this on a snowy winter day; it made the house smell good all day long and our tummies full at the end of the day! Best stew I have ever had."
"Soft cut out sugar cookie that I have used for years. I sprinkle with colored sugar before baking or you could also try icing them when cool."

ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) bottle McCormick Red Food Color

"Banana Cream Pie is one of the yummiest things on earth and this is a great one."
"These chops are so easy to make, but they taste like you've slaved over them for hours! Serve with roasted red potatoes and vegetables, if desired."
"This recipe is thick and flavorful.  It is simple, delicious, and quick to make, enjoy (I know you will)."
"This is a Kansas City-style sauce that I make in my restaurant. It is sweet and smoky with a little bite."
"This easy yeast roll recipe was given to me by my Great, Great Grandmother. I used it a couple of years ago in our state fair and received first place."
"This easy vegetarian quiche is a snap to make but looks great on the table."
"They are very, very easy to make, and really fabulously delicious."

ingredients: 4 1/2 cups cooked and mashed sweet potatoes

"This beautiful marinade adds an exquisite flavor to these already tender steaks. The final result will be so tender and juicy, it will melt in your mouth."

recipes.description: "This chicken Parmesan is done casserole style (so, no breading or frying!), but still offers up that irresistible combination of tender chicken, crunchy/cheesy coating, and flavorful sauce."
"For a delicious, no-fuss ham that is juicy and good, try this slow cooker sensation with only two ingredients!"
"Herb-rubbed roasted pork loin with a sweet, tangy glaze."
"This recipe has won many 1st place ribbons at my state fair. They are very simple to make."
"This is the most successful and versatile quick bread recipe I've found! You can also use chunky applesauce or a 15 ounce can of pumpkin for wonderful variations."

"I double the recipe and put in a glass baking dish (9x13 inches). Nice for holidays . . . Keep it for a secret and family and friends will think you worked forever on it . . . (smiles). You can also use peanut butter chips and make peanut butter fudge."

ingredients: 1 fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and sliced
recipes.description: "This is an easy and exotic Indian dish. It's rich, creamy, mildly spiced, and extremely flavorful. Serve with naan and rice."

"This recipe from the Florida Keys has been given to almost everyone I know. It is the best marinade for chicken, and it only takes 30 minutes from prep till you can grill! It's a great blend of flavors with honey, soy sauce, and lime juice. If you have time, try marinating overnight for the fullest flavor."

ingredients: 1 skinless, boneless chicken breast half - cut into cubes
recipes.description: "The name Mulligatawny means 'pepper water', and curry is the particular ingredient that gives this incredible soup such a delicious flavor...so I'm told. This old recipe was given to me long ago."

ingredients: 2 (3.5 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix

"This quick and easy shortbread will literally melt when you take a bite. Great for Christmas parties with a little bit of decorating."

"Take a trip to the county fair with a bowl of old-fashioned Kettle Corn. Your family will never want plain popcorn again! If you use white sugar, it will taste like popcorn balls and if you use brown sugar, it will taste like caramel corn."
"This is an easy to make but wonderfully delicious treat.  We pack them in tins and give as gifts during the holidays.  Use your favorite nuts to top the cookies."
"I make this at least twice when blueberries are in season. Makes a great coffeecake or dessert."
"These are the most tender and succulent pork chops you've ever had. My fiance absolutely loves them! Serve over noodles or rice."

ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup

recipes.description: "This is a great dish that's very easy to make with just a few ingredients.  Great with rolls of any type.  I got this recipe from my mom years ago and it is a family favorite."

ingredients: 3 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cooked and cubed

recipes.description: "Pizza with a little kick of buffalo wing flavor! Have your pizza and wings together!"

ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

"The red and green make a great Christmas cookie. Have used other nuts instead of pistachios with success. If your pistachios are salted, omit the 1/4 teaspoon salt from the recipe."

"This recipe is requested at every family gathering. Let it be your next dish that they crave! I like this dish to be prepared at least two hours before serving. Be sure to have copies of the recipe on hand, as everyone will ask for it!"
"Tastes good for breakfast,  just like French toast. It's easy to make too! Serve warm with maple syrup on top."
"A glaze featuring balsamic vinegar, garlic, honey, white wine and Dijon mustard makes baked salmon fillets extraordinary."
"This is a tried-and-true, old-fashioned coconut cream pie. Took many years of searching and baking to find the right one and this is it! Enjoy!"

ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package uncooked medium egg noodles
2 (5 ounce) cans tuna, drained and flaked
recipes.description: "No canned soup mix in this recipe! Mushrooms, onions, celery, and peas all go into this comfort casserole."

ingredients: 1 (1.25 ounce) package dry taco seasoning mix
3 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
recipes.description: "This is a nice change from plain chicken tacos.  The cilantro really adds a burst of flavor to this recipe."

ingredients: 2 (3 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
recipes.description: "This is a no-bake pudding dessert that's so quick and easy to make--everyone loves it. I always keep the ingredients on hand in case I need a quick dessert. It's best if it sits overnight before serving."

ingredients: 2 (16 ounce) cans whole peeled tomatoes, with liquid
1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix
1 (15 ounce) can cut green beans, drained
recipes.description: "This tomato and cabbage soup was rumored, in days of old, to melt away those thighs."

"A wonderful flank steak on the grill recipe I invented that friends just love! My girls think this is great, and it doesn't take long to grill. This also works great when sliced and used for fajitas."

"Country-style ribs are cut from the loin, one of the leanest areas of pork. These ribs are seasoned, boiled until tender, then baked with your favorite barbeque sauce. That's it! Back to simplicity, back to the country life. Sigh."
"I use to make regular cabbage rolls until I found this recipe. Now, instead, I make this and it is as good as the regular cabbage rolls and alot easier."
"These really taste like crab cakes but without the crab, and are a really good way to utilize that bumper crop of zucchini!"
"After trying different cake recipes that I thought were too dry, I decided to try making up one of my own."

ingredients: 1 quart oil for frying, or as needed
recipes.description: "This is an actual recipe from a former employee of a popular drive-in restaurant. Crispy coated onion rings like the pro's make!"
"A delicious source of fiber! My family have them almost every morning. Great healthy muffins! You may substitute dates for the raisins if you wish."

ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained

recipes.description: "Serve with tortilla chips. Very addicting!"

"When I was a little girl, my mother would always make us crepes on Sundays. I also loved the smell of vanilla when my mother would make her cookies. My mother get a kick out of this, and said, well, if it's that important, we'll add a little vanilla kick, just for you. After the first time she put the vanilla in, there was never a last...it became a tradition."
